name: DUAT (Posly)
description:
The result of a mix between a rogue like and a memory ? DUAT

We are playing an adventurer in the Afterlife. 

Learn different powers and remember then. But be careful because with each test you start from zero !

Features :

- procedural dungeon

- 14 powers

Developped during the Mini Jam 61 by Jérémy de Frémont and Logan Delmay.
